name: Four Knight's of the Apocalypse, Horsemen of Death
text: This card can only be summoned when you have three other Knight's of the Apocalypse ritual monster's on the field. This card gains 500 ATK for each monster in either player's Graveyards or are banished. All of your opponents cards are bannished instead of going to the graveyard. Once per turn; you can special summon a "Omni" monster from your graveyard.
